title: OpenStrand - Free Open Source Personal Knowledge Management System
description: OpenStrand is a free, open source PKMS that organizes your markdown notes into interconnected knowledge fabrics. Works 100% offline, forever free, with AI-powered flashcards and quizzes.

title: OpenStrand - Open Source Knowledge Fabric for Markdown Notes
description: Transform your markdown notes into an interconnected knowledge fabric. OpenStrand is a free, open source PKMS that works 100% offline with AI-powered learning tools. Compare to Obsidian, Notion, Roam Research.

title: Dashboard - OpenStrand AI Data Visualization
description: Create beautiful data visualizations with natural language. Upload CSV, JSON, or TSV files and let AI generate charts, graphs, and insights automatically.

title: Pricing - OpenStrand Community & Teams Editions
description: OpenStrand Community Edition is free forever with full features. Teams Edition adds collaboration, sharing, and enterprise features. Compare plans and choose what's right for you.

title: Knowledge Fabric Browser - OpenStrand PKMS
description: Browse and organize your knowledge fabric with OpenStrand's hierarchical browser. Navigate Weaves, Looms, and Strands in your personal knowledge management system.

title: Knowledge Graph - OpenStrand
description: Visualize connections between your notes with OpenStrand's interactive knowledge graph. See how ideas link together and discover new relationships.

title: AI Flashcards & Spaced Repetition - OpenStrand
description: Generate flashcards automatically from your notes using AI. Study with spaced repetition for optimal long-term retention. Free in Community Edition with your own API keys.

title: OpenStrand Tutorials & Documentation
description: Learn how to use OpenStrand effectively with our comprehensive tutorials. From pen-and-paper modeling to AI augmentation workflows.

title: Tutorial: Pen & Paper Knowledge Modeling - OpenStrand
description: Learn OpenStrand's statistical and deterministic approach to knowledge organization. Model your Fabric, Weaves, Looms, and Strands on paper before digitizing.

title: Tutorial: Offline-First Analytics Without LLMs - OpenStrand
description: Use OpenStrand's deterministic NLP pipeline for auto-tagging and categorization without API keys. Perfect for air-gapped or privacy-conscious deployments.

title: Tutorial: AI-Augmented Workflows - OpenStrand
description: Enhance your knowledge management with optional AI features. Learn prompt engineering, cost optimization, and human-in-the-loop review workflows.

title: Tutorial: Metadata Architecture - OpenStrand
description: Design robust metadata schemas for your knowledge fabric. Learn taxonomy design, tagging strategies, and governance best practices.

title: Tutorial: Developer Experience Blueprint - OpenStrand
description: Extend and customize OpenStrand with our DX/UX guidelines. Build plugins, themes, and integrations following best practices.

title: Teams Edition - OpenStrand Collaboration
description: OpenStrand Teams Edition enables real-time collaboration, sharing, comments, and enterprise features. Perfect for research teams, companies, and organizations.

title: FAQ - OpenStrand
description: Frequently asked questions about OpenStrand. Learn about features, pricing, data privacy, offline capabilities, and more.

title: About OpenStrand - Our Mission
description: OpenStrand is built by Frame.dev to democratize knowledge management. Learn about our mission, team, and commitment to open source.
